creator: edisongustavo@gmail.com
text:
I got a ClassNotFoundException when I tried to run the following code:

<project name="Build" default="init">
	<target name="init">
		<java classname="com.hoplon.AClass">
			<classpath location="bin"/>
		</java>
	</target>
</project>

But it was running ok at 1.6.5, if I changed to the 'path' attribute it worked.

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40547 ***
